code: x<-c(11,2,3,2,3,23,4,5,4,100) non_recursive_moving(x)$original_rts #>  [1]  11   2   3   2   3  23   4   5   4 100 non_recursive_moving(x)$restricted #> [1] 11  2  3  2  3 23  4  5  4 non_recursive_moving(x)$prop_removed #> [1] 0.1 modified_recursive_moving(x)$original_rts #>  [1]  11   2   3   2   3  23   4   5   4 100 modified_recursive_moving(x)$restricted #> [1] 2 3 2 3 4 5 4 modified_recursive_moving(x)$prop_removed #> [1] 0.3

code: df  #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (missing(ncp))  #>         .Call(C_df, x, df1, df2, log) #>     else .Call(C_dnf, x, df1, df2, ncp, log) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x7fade34efb30> #> <environment: namespace:stats>  pipe_print(df)  #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (missing(ncp))  #>         .Call(C_df, x, df1, df2, log) #>     else .Call(C_dnf, x, df1, df2, ncp, log) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x7fade34efb30> #> <environment: namespace:stats> #> function (x, df1, df2, ncp, log = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (missing(ncp))  #>         .Call(C_df, x, df1, df2, log) #>     else .Call(C_dnf, x, df1, df2, ncp, log) #> } #> <bytecode: 0x7fade34efb30> #> <environment: namespace:stats>  summarise() #> Error in summarise(): could not find function "summarise"   ## pipe_print <- function(data) {print(data); data}   { pipe_print } #> function (data)  #> { #>     print(data) #>     data #> } #> <bytecode: 0x7fade36bec18> #> <environment: namespace:crumplabr>

code: x<-c(1,2,3,4,5,4,3,4,) #> Error in c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 4, 3, 4, ): argument 9 is empty stde(x) #> Error in is.data.frame(x): object 'x' not found  ## The function is currently defined as function (x)  sd(x)/sqrt(length(x)) #> function (x)  #> sd(x)/sqrt(length(x)) #> <environment: 0x7fade122e4e8>
